thread.title: Florida Gives Payday Lenders a Boost

author: Yuka Hayashi
title: Florida Gives Payday Lenders a Boost
text:
Florida eased restrictions on payday lending, allowing companies to make bigger, longer loans in a move aimed at bypassing a federal rule that clamps down on the industry.
Gov. Rick Scott, a Republican, signed the change into law Monday after state lawmakers passed legislation earlier this month with bipartisan support, a result attributed in part to intense industry lobbying.
Florida...
